summary: The diff implements comprehensive edit functionality for Cash, Sell, and Milk Collection entries as specified. All four requirements are addressed with backend update functions, frontend edit dialogs, and proper validation. The implementation appears complete and aligned with the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added to handle schema changes for adding IDs to CollectionEntry
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 requires backend update functions but does not mention migration logic or schema changes. The migration.mo file transforms old CollectionEntry records without IDs to new ones with IDs, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Edit session field in milk collection entries
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifies editing weight, fat percentage, SNF value, and date only. The editSession state and session modification capability in DataReports.tsx was not requested.
